page.title: 06EDUCATION - CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: {ISLE OF THORNS}80 acres is enclosed and leased from the Manor Charitable Trust by Sussex University, used as educational & outdoor activity centre. The White House Conference Centre catering for 50 is run by University. 33% use as Biology, Ecology Field courses and tutorial sessions. Other courses privately funded by commerce and local government. Hutted accommo- dation and camp site let to schools, Girl Guides, Boy Scouts, London commu- nity centres and deprived children in E.Sussex for activitiy weeks in summer with use of extensive outdoor sports facilities. Swimming, tennis, cricket, football, golf.{CHELWOOD VACHERY}- the B.A.T. Industries Residential Group Management Centre. Various courses for the development of managerial skills for employees from world wide companies.
